response_text: The official Cloudbeds pricing page can be found at: [https://www.cloudbeds.com/pricing](https://www.cloudbeds.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

FAQ

What is Cloudbeds?
------------------

Cloudbeds award-winning, cloud-based hospitality management software seamlessly combines solutions for front desk, revenue management, distribution, guest acquisition, and guest engagement in a single unified system, enhanced by a marketplace of third-party integrations. The SaaS company creates modern, all-in-one hotel management software for hoteliers and hosts worldwide.

What does Cloudbeds do?
-----------------------

The Cloudbeds Hospitality Platform is designed to streamline operations, grow revenue faster, and deliver memorable guest experiences for lodging businesses of all sizes and types across the globe. Hoteliers and hosts use Cloudbeds’ unified platform to implement automation that streamlines operations and workflows from check-in to invoicing and much more. Cloudbeds has been named a top PMS, Hotel Management System and Channel Manager (2021-2024) by Hotel Tech Report, World’s Best Hotel PMS Solutions Provider (2022) by World Travel Awards, and recognized in Deloitte’s Technology Fast 500 in 2023. [See Cloudbeds reviews.](https://www.cloudbeds.com/reviews/)

Where is Cloudbeds based?
-------------------------

Cloudbeds has employees in more than 40 countries that speak more than 30 languages. Our headquarters is in San Diego, CA, USA and we also have offices in Brazil, Canada, Italy, Spain, and Ireland.

How much does Cloudbeds cost?
-----------------------------

Cloudbeds pricing plans are tiered so you can select the one that best fits the unique needs of your lodging business. The pricing models are designed for independent properties, vacation rentals, and alternative accommodations of all sizes and budgets, from B&Bs and inns to hotel groups with multiple properties. Get a personalized demo and quote.

Does Cloudbeds charge any commissions?
--------------------------------------

Cloudbeds does not charge added commissions on reservations made through the Cloudbeds Booking Engine or the Cloudbeds Channel Manager. Any direct reservations or hotel booking made via Cloudbeds’ online Booking Engine are commission free. Commissions are charged on offering like Metasearch only **after** a guest completes their stay at your property. We do NOT charge commissions on a booking, saving you money if guests does not complete their stay. The Cloudbeds Channel Manager connects to hundreds of OTAs and other distribution channels in real-time with zero added commissions.

Are there any extra fees?
-------------------------

All of the core Cloudbeds features required to run your business are available with every plan, including, but not limited to, the Cloudbeds Property Management System, Booking Engine, Channel Manager, and 24/7 customer support. We also have additional built-in products designed to enhance your business that are available as add-ons.

How does onboarding work at Cloudbeds?
--------------------------------------

Onboarding is the process of enabling your property on the Cloudbeds platform and setting you up for long-term success. It can take place on a self-serve basis or with an Onboarding coach, your choice. Not only is our platform known for ease of use, but switching to Cloudbeds is so easy that around 600 properties do it every month! Cloudbeds onboarding experience starts with a kick-off call where you’ll meet your dedicated onboarding coach. Once onboarding is complete, you’ll have access to our 24/7 in-house customer support team. [Learn more about Cloudbeds’ onboarding](https://www.cloudbeds.com/what-to-expect/) process and estimated timeline.

FAQ

What is Cloudbeds?
------------------

Cloudbeds award-winning, cloud-based hospitality management software seamlessly combines solutions for front desk, revenue management, distribution, guest acquisition, and guest engagement in a single unified system, enhanced by a marketplace of third-party integrations. The SaaS company creates modern, all-in-one hotel management software for hoteliers and hosts worldwide.

What does Cloudbeds do?
-----------------------

The Cloudbeds Hospitality Platform is designed to streamline operations, grow revenue faster, and deliver memorable guest experiences for lodging businesses of all sizes and types across the globe. Hoteliers and hosts use Cloudbeds’ unified platform to implement automation that streamlines operations and workflows from check-in to invoicing and much more. Cloudbeds has been named a top PMS, Hotel Management System and Channel Manager (2021-2024) by Hotel Tech Report, World’s Best Hotel PMS Solutions Provider (2022) by World Travel Awards, and recognized in Deloitte’s Technology Fast 500 in 2023. [See Cloudbeds reviews.](https://www.cloudbeds.com/reviews/)

Where is Cloudbeds based?
-------------------------

Cloudbeds has employees in more than 40 countries that speak more than 30 languages. Our headquarters is in San Diego, CA, USA and we also have offices in Brazil, Canada, Italy, Spain, and Ireland.

How much does Cloudbeds cost?
-----------------------------

Cloudbeds pricing plans are tiered so you can select the one that best fits the unique needs of your lodging business. The pricing models are designed for independent properties, vacation rentals, and alternative accommodations of all sizes and budgets, from B&Bs and inns to hotel groups with multiple properties. Get a personalized demo and quote.

Does Cloudbeds charge any commissions?
--------------------------------------

Cloudbeds does not charge added commissions on reservations made through the Cloudbeds Booking Engine or the Cloudbeds Channel Manager. Any direct reservations or hotel booking made via Cloudbeds’ online Booking Engine are commission free. Commissions are charged on offering like Metasearch only **after** a guest completes their stay at your property. We do NOT charge commissions on a booking, saving you money if guests does not complete their stay. The Cloudbeds Channel Manager connects to hundreds of OTAs and other distribution channels in real-time with zero added commissions.

Are there any extra fees?
-------------------------

All of the core Cloudbeds features required to run your business are available with every plan, including, but not limited to, the Cloudbeds Property Management System, Booking Engine, Channel Manager, and 24/7 customer support. We also have additional built-in products designed to enhance your business that are available as add-ons.

How does onboarding work at Cloudbeds?
--------------------------------------

Onboarding is the process of enabling your property on the Cloudbeds platform and setting you up for long-term success. It can take place on a self-serve basis or with an Onboarding coach, your choice. Not only is our platform known for ease of use, but switching to Cloudbeds is so easy that around 600 properties do it every month! Cloudbeds onboarding experience starts with a kick-off call where you’ll meet your dedicated onboarding coach. Once onboarding is complete, you’ll have access to our 24/7 in-house customer support team. [Learn more about Cloudbeds’ onboarding](https://www.cloudbeds.com/what-to-expect/) process and estimated timeline.
